can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
Hoh Xil or Kekexili, vast nature reserve on Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]
Keketuohai town in Fuyun county 富蘊縣|富蕴县[Fu4 yun4 xian4], Altay prefecture, Xinjiang
Keketuohai town in Fuyun county 富蘊縣|富蕴县[Fu4 yun4 xian4], Altay prefecture, Xinjiang

sentences.english: Cocoa paste, whether or not defatted.
Which continent produces the most cocoa?
sentences.chinese: 哪一個大陸生產了大部份的可可亞？

sentences.english: After arriving in Switzerland, the imported raw cocoa is subject to a strict quality control.
sentences.chinese: 當可可豆到達瑞士後，將要進行嚴格的質控程序。

sentences.english: The seeds from the tree known as Theobroma cacao make up chocolates.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力是由來自可可樹上種子做成的。

sentences.english: By changing the type of alkalising agent, it also became possible to adjust the colour of the cocoa powder.
sentences.chinese: 變換不同的鹼劑，改變可可粉的顏色也就有了可能。

sentences.english: Of course, the sensory effects of coffee, and other warm beverages, like tea or cocoa, can lift your spirits.
sentences.chinese: 當然，咖啡和類似茶，可可等其它熱飲能提神。

sentences.english: From the very early days of cocoa the peoples of Central America used beans as a form of payment.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，美洲中部的先民就用可可豆作爲支付方式。

sentences.english: Cocoa contains chemical compounds called flavanols.
sentences.chinese: 可可中包含一種被稱爲黃烷醇的化學成分。

sentences.english: The Hohxil Region of Qinghai Province is one of the region studied less in the world.
sentences.chinese: 青海可可西里地區是世界上最少研究的地區之一。
還有小狗巴迪，小貓可可。

sentences.english: Cocona fruit is another tropical fruit found in the mountainous regions of South America.
sentences.chinese: 可可果是在南美洲山區發現的別一種熱帶水果。

sentences.english: Study on Somatic Embryogenesis and Plant Regeneration of Theobroma Cacao L.
sentences.chinese: 可可體細胞胚胎發生及植株再生體系的構建。

sentences.english: We drank cocoa-coffee and some special tea such as tea with rice smell.
sentences.chinese: 然而回滬後再喝可可咖啡沒有當時的甜美。

sentences.english: The health benefits of chocolate come from flavonoids, a type of phytochemical found in the cacao bean.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的益處來源於可可豆中的一種黃酮。

sentences.english: Kuna who live on mainland Panama, though, don’t drink the cocoa.
sentences.chinese: 但是生活在巴拿馬主島的庫那族居民並不喝可可飲料。

sentences.english: Whole cocoa beans can also be purchased.
sentences.chinese: 全可可豆在這裏也可以購買到。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
